mystory.germanspeak: Hi, I'm a German-speaking Frontend Developer based in Dillingen an der Donau. I enjoy building visually appealing and user-friendly websites and applications. The ever-evolving nature of IT keeps me motivated, and I love learning new technologies to stay up to date.
mystory.workFlexi: I'm flexible when it comes to work settings. Whether on-site in Dillingen an der Donau or remotely, I adapt easily and stay efficient in different environments. Collaboration and clear communication are important to me, no matter where I work.
mystory.mindset: I have an open mindset and always look for ways to improve my skills. I enjoy taking on challenges that push me to grow both professionally and personally.
mystory.quality: For me, programming is more than just writing code—it's about finding the best way to solve problems. I focus on turning complex ideas into simple, effective solutions that help users and businesses achieve their goals. I'm always open to interesting projects and new opportunities. Let’s connect!

reference.kollege: What my colleagues say about me

skillset.intro: I am a passionate front-end developer with experience in various modern web technologies. I have worked extensively with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks like Angular. My focus is on creating intuitive and responsive user interfaces while ensuring seamless user experiences. I am always open to learning and adapting to new technologies, as I believe keeping up with the fast-paced evolution of web development is crucial. Exploring emerging trends and best practices helps me refine my skills and stay ahead in the industry.
skillset.closing: Feel free to contact me! I look forward to expanding my knowledge and contributing to exciting new opportunities.
skillset.interest: I have a special interest in learning

port.intro:
Discover some of my projects here – Engage with them
to experience my skills firsthand.

popup.description01: A task manager inspired by the Kanban system: create and organize tasks using drag-and-drop functionality, assign users, and categorize tasks.
popup.description02: Polo-Loco is a game developed using OOP, where the goal is to collect coins, defeat chicks and chickens, and finally beat the main boss.
popup.description03: The Pokodex project is built using an API, where game cards are loaded through the API and then programmed and displayed using JavaScript.

contact.action: Encourage people to contact you and describe what role you are interested in. Show that you will add value to their projects through your work.
contact.headline: Need a Frontend developer? Let's talk!
contact.name: What's your name?
contact.privarcy: I've read the privacy policy and agree to the processing of my data as outlined

warning.name: Oops! it seems your name is missing
warning.message: What do you need to develop?

alice.name: Alice Johnson
alice.text: I had the chance to work with Davlat on a few projects. He is reliable, communicates clearly, and always keeps the bigger picture in mind. I enjoyed collaborating with him.

omer.name: Omer Faruqi
omer.text: Davlat brings good energy to the team. He picks up new tools quickly and handles feedback professionally. A solid teammate who can be counted on.

charlie.name: Charlie Rose
charlie.text: Working alongside Davlat was straightforward and effective. He approaches tasks with responsibility and stays calm even when deadlines are close. I would happily work with him again.
